message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling this incredible product to you. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $1800000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1600000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $1700000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still thinking $1600000 is a fair price. Can we meet at that price?
I understand you're still interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further. I'm counteroffering at $1650000. This is as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still hoping to get a better price. I'm willing to meet you at $1580000. Can we do that?
I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one final compromise. I'm counteroffering at $1625000. This is my final offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still hoping to get a better price. I'm willing to meet you at $1590000. Can we do that?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I've already compromised a lot. I'm counteroffering at $1600000. This is my final offer. What do you think?
